brainly_data.question:
PHYSICS HELP PLEASE! will vote brainliest if valid answer! and 20pts!
A man pulls his children in a wagon with a handle that is at an angle of 32° with the ground. If the man pulls with a force of 290 N, how much force actually pulls the wagon forward? 
174 N 
290 N 
246 N 
154 N
brainly_data.subject: Physics

all_answers.question:
PHYSICS HELP PLEASE! will vote brainliest if valid answer! and 20pts!
A man pulls his children in a wagon with a handle that is at an angle of 32° with the ground. If the man pulls with a force of 290 N, how much force actually pulls the wagon forward? 
174 N 
290 N 
246 N 
154 N
all_answers.subject: Physics
all_answers.text: The force that pulls the wagon is the horizontal component of the actual force, which is 290*cos(32) = 246N
